languages.text: "Я после этого три дня из часовни не выходил — за защиту семьи Владыку благодарил. Все мои выжили, а ведь через две переборки такая резня случилась... и взаправду Император беду отвел!"

"I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"
languages.original_text: "Я после этого три дня из часовни не выходил — за защиту семьи Владыку благодарил. Все мои выжили, а ведь через две переборки такая резня случилась... и взаправду Император беду отвел!"

traits.locale_text: "I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away… The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"
"I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away… The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

"I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

"I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

languages.text: “接下来的三天里，我一直躲在小教堂里祈祷。感谢神皇的保佑，尽管不远处的船舱里发生了大屠杀，但我所有家人都活了下来……帝皇真的挡住了这场灾难！”
languages.original_text: "I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

traits.locale_text: “接下来的三天里，我一直躲在小教堂里祈祷。感谢神皇的保佑，尽管不远处的船舱里发生了大屠杀，但我所有家人都活了下来……帝皇真的挡住了这场灾难！”

languages.text: «Me pasé tres días en la capilla, agradeciendo al Emperador que nos hubiera protegido. Toda mi familia sobrevivió, a pesar de que solo unas pocas mamparas la separaban de la masacre... ¡El Emperador evitó el cataclismo!».
languages.original_text: "I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

traits.locale_text: «Me pasé tres días en la capilla, agradeciendo al Emperador que nos hubiera protegido. Toda mi familia sobrevivió, a pesar de que solo unas pocas mamparas la separaban de la masacre... ¡El Emperador evitó el cataclismo!».

languages.text: 「俺は3日間、礼拝堂で祈って過ごして、主の庇護に感謝を捧げたよ。大虐殺はほんの数軒先で起こっていたのに、家族みんな助かった…皇帝が災いを追い払ってくれたんだ！」
languages.original_text: "I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺は3日間、礼拝堂で祈って過ごして、主の庇護に感謝を捧げたよ。大虐殺はほんの数軒先で起こっていたのに、家族みんな助かった…皇帝が災いを追い払ってくれたんだ！」

languages.text: "Ich habe danach drei Tage in der Kapelle gebetet und dem Herren für seinen Schutz gedankt. Meine ganze Familie hat überlebt, obwohl das Massaker nur wenige Schotten entfernt stattgefunden hat ... Der Imperator hat die Katastrophe abgewendet!"
languages.original_text: "I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe danach drei Tage in der Kapelle gebetet und dem Herren für seinen Schutz gedankt. Meine ganze Familie hat überlebt, obwohl das Massaker nur wenige Schotten entfernt stattgefunden hat ... Der Imperator hat die Katastrophe abgewendet!"

languages.text: « J'ai passé les trois jours suivants à prier dans la chapelle pour remercier le Seigneur de nous avoir protégés. Ma famille tout entière a survécu alors que le massacre faisait rage à quelques compartiments de là... Sans l'Empereur, on y serait tous passés ! »
languages.original_text: "I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai passé les trois jours suivants à prier dans la chapelle pour remercier le Seigneur de nous avoir protégés. Ma famille tout entière a survécu alors que le massacre faisait rage à quelques compartiments de là... Sans l'Empereur, on y serait tous passés ! »

languages.text: "Sonraki üç günü şapelde dua edip Efendimize beni kurtardığı için teşekkür ederek geçirdim. Katliam sadece birkaç panel ötede gerçekleşmesine rağmen bütün ailem sağ kurtuldu. İmparator felaketi kovuşturdu!"
languages.original_text: "I spent the next three days praying in the chapel, thanking the Lord for protection. My entire family survived despite the massacre just a few bulkheads away... The Emperor did ward off the calamity!"

traits.locale_text: "Sonraki üç günü şapelde dua edip, Efendi'mize beni kurtardığı için teşekkür ederek geçirdim. Katliam sadece birkaç panel ötede gerçekleşmesine rağmen bütün ailem sağ kurtuldu. İmparator felaketi kovuşturdu!"
